mapper.select: SELECT * FROM schedules ORDER BY start_time ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO schedules ( emp_num, title, description, location, start_time, end_time, all_day, created_at ) VALUES ( #{empNum}, #{title}, #{description}, #{location}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{allDay}, NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE schedules SET title = #{title}, description = #{description}, location = #{location}, start_time = #{startTime}, end_time = #{endTime}, all_day = #{allDay}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO schedule_participants (schedule_id, emp_num, status, joined_at) VALUES (#{scheduleId}, #{empNum}, #{status}, NOW())
